official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to design and construct a project for flood control on Licking River at Salyersville, Kentucky.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to design and construct necessary flood control measures, at full Federal expense, on Licking River at Salyersville, Kentucky. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to design and construct a project for flood control on Licking River at Salyersville, Kentucky.
